author: Albert Einstein
quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: However difficult life may seem there is always something you can do.

author: Sir Issac Newton
quote: If i have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.

author: Madam Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.

author: Nikol Tesla
quote: The present is theirs, the future for which i really worked is mine.

author: Carl Sagan
quote: Somewhere, somwthing incredible is waiting to be known.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered.

author: Charles Darwin
quote: It is not the strongest that survive but the most adaptable.

author: Thomas Edison
quote: I have not failed. I have just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
